welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description:
Whenever you want, you can return to the colorful and
profitable world of dolly.
authemail.title: Email Address
authemail.description: You can start by entering your email address.
authpassword.title: Your Password
authpassword.description: You can step into the world of dolly by entering your password.
dolly.paracikDescription: You can use them worth of Turkish Lira.
QR.usageInfoText: You can benefit from the offers by scanning the QR code at the checkout or typing the code below in online shopping.
paracikBalance.usageInfoText: You can spend at least 1.50 TL in all brands affiliated with dolly.
TLBalance.canUseText: dollypay card is a free virtual card that you can easily load into your dollypay account and spend anywhere you want. With this card;
TLBalance.brandsAdvantageText: You can multiply your money in brands affiliated with dolly.
TLBalance.sendFriendsAdvantageText: Send money to your friends instantly.
TLBalance.shopECommerceAdvantageText: You can easily shop on all e-commerce sites.
myCards.debitandCreditCardsDescription: Save your cards to Masterpass and easily make your purchases with dolly mobile payment.
myCards.transportationCardsDescription: You can load money into your cards with Paracik by saving your Istanbul Card.
